blocks.name: frfnom
blocks.content: The function generated by finite recursive definition generation is a function on omega. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm frfnom(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wfn(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com), com)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wfn(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com), com), wfun(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com)), wceq(cdm(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com)), com))
  ax-mp(wfun(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com)), wfun(crdg(c0, c1)))
  rdgfun(c0, c1)
  funres(crdg(c0, c1), com)
  eqtri(cdm(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com)), com, cin(com, cdm(crdg(c0, c1))))
  dmres(crdg(c0, c1), com)
  mpbi(wceq(cin(com, cdm(crdg(c0, c1))), com), wss(com, cdm(crdg(c0, c1))))
  ax-mp(wss(com, cdm(crdg(c0, c1))), wlim(cdm(crdg(c0, c1))))
  rdgdmlim(c0, c1)
  limomss(cdm(crdg(c0, c1)))
  df-ss(com, cdm(crdg(c0, c1)))
  df-fn(cres(crdg(c0, c1), com), com)
}

  eqtri(dom((rec(c0, c1)|` _om)), com, (_om â‹‚ dom(rec(c0, c1))))
  dmres(rec(c0, c1), com)
  mpbi((_om â‹‚ dom(rec(c0, c1)))= _om, _om âŠ† dom(rec(c0, c1)))
  ax-mp(_om âŠ† dom(rec(c0, c1)), Lim(dom(rec(c0, c1))))

  limomss(dom(rec(c0, c1)))

}

blocks.name: fr0g
blocks.content: The initial value resulting from finite recursive definition generation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1996.)

blocks.name: frsuc
blocks.content: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm frsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), csuc(c0)), cfv(c1, cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), c0))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), csuc(c0)), cfv(c1, cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), c0)), cfv(crdg(c1, c2), csuc(c0)), cfv(c1, cfv(crdg(c1, c2), c0)), wcel(c0, com))
  syl(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(crdg(c1, c2), csuc(c0)), cfv(c1, cfv(crdg(c1, c2), c0))), wcel(c0, cdm(crdg(c1, c2))))
  sseli(c0, com, cdm(crdg(c1, c2)))
  ax-mp(wss(com, cdm(crdg(c1, c2))), wlim(cdm(crdg(c1, c2))))
  rdgdmlim(c1, c2)
  limomss(cdm(crdg(c1, c2)))
  rdgsucg(c0, c1, c2)
  sylbi(wcel(c0, com), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), csuc(c0)), cfv(crdg(c1, c2), csuc(c0))), wcel(csuc(c0), com))
  peano2b(c0)
  fvres(csuc(c0), com, crdg(c1, c2))
  fveq2d(c1, cfv(cres(crdg(c1, c2), com), c0), cfv(crdg(c1, c2), c0), wcel(c0, com))
  fvres(c0, com, crdg(c1, c2))
}

} = {

  rdgdmlim(c1, c2)
  limomss(dom(rec(c1, c2)))
  rdgsucg(c0, c1, c2)
  sylbi(c0 âˆˆ _om, ((rec(c1, c2)|` _om)` suc(c0))=(rec(c1, c2)` suc(c0)), suc(c0)âˆˆ _om)
  peano2b(c0)
  fvres(suc(c0), com, rec(c1, c2))
  fveq2d(c1, ((rec(c1, c2)|` _om)` c0), (rec(c1, c2)` c0), c0 âˆˆ _om)
  fvres(c0, com, rec(c1, c2))
}

blocks.name: frsucmpt
blocks.content: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation (special case where the generation function is expressed in maps-to notation). (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 2-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm frsucmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csuc(c0)), c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c4)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wceq(c3, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(c5, c1))
} = {
  sylan9eq(cfv(c3, csuc(c0)), c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), cfv(c3, c0)), wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, c2))
  3eqtr4g(cfv(c3, csuc(c0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), cfv(c3, c0)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com), csuc(c0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com), c0)), wcel(c0, com))
  frsuc(c0, cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4)
  fveq1i(c3, csuc(c0), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com))
  fveq2i(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), cfv(c3, c0), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com), c0))
  fveq1i(c3, c0, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com))
  mpan(wcel(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), cfv(c3, c0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), universe))
  fvex(c3, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, cfv(c3, c0), universe, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c5)
  nffv(s0, c3, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com))
  nfres(s0, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4), com)
  nfrdg(s0, cmpt(s0, universe, c5), c4)
  nfmpt1(s0, universe, c5)
  nfcv(s0, com)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, universe, c5))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

thm frsucmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  3eqtr4g((c3 ` suc(c0)), ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5)`(c3 ` c0)), ((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om)` suc(c0)), ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5)`((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om)` c0)), c0 âˆˆ _om)
  frsuc(c0, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)
  fveq1i(c3, suc(c0), (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om))
  fveq2i((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), (c3 ` c0), ((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om)` c0))
  fveq1i(c3, c0, (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om))
  mpan(c1 âˆˆ c2, ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5)`(c3 ` c0))= c1, (c3 ` c0)âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  fvex(c3, c0)
  fvmptf(s0, (c3 ` c0), universe, c1, c2, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c5)
  nffv(s0, c3, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4)|` _om))
  nfres(s0, rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c5), c4), com)

blocks.name: frsucmptn
blocks.content: The value of the finite recursive definition generator at a successor (special case where the characteristic function is a mapping abstraction and where the mapping class ` D ` is a proper class). This is a technical lemma that can be used together with ~ frsucmpt to help eliminate redundant sethood antecedents. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Feb-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frsucmptn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(c1, csuc(c2)), emptycls))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c1, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c1, c2)), wceq(c4, c0))
} = {
  syl5eq(cfv(c1, csuc(c2)), emptycls, cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq1i(c1, csuc(c2), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))
  pm2.61d1(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), emptycls), wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))))
  syl5bi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(csuc(c2), cdm(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), emptycls), wcel(csuc(c2), com))
  eleq2i(csuc(c2), cdm(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com)), com)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com)), com), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), com))
  frfnom(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3)
  fndm(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), com)
  syl5bir(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(csuc(c2), com), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), emptycls), wcel(c2, com))
  peano2b(c2)
  ex(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, com), wceq(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), emptycls))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), emptycls, cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), cfv(c1, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wcel(c2, com))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), csuc(c2)), cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), c2)), wcel(c2, com))
  frsuc(c2, cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3)
  fveq2i(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), cfv(c1, c2), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com), c2))
  fveq1i(c1, c2, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))
  fvmptnf(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, universe, c4), cfv(c1, c2), c4, universe)
  nffv(s0, c1, c2)
  nfcxfr(s0, c1, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))
  nfres(s0, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com)
  nfrdg(s0, cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3)
  nfmpt1(s0, universe, c4)
  nfcv(s0, com)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, universe, c4))
  ndmfv(csuc(c2), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c3), com))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

  âŠ¢ (Â¬ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†’(c1 ` suc(c2))= âˆ…)

  syl5bi(Â¬ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, suc(c2)âˆˆ dom((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)), ((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` suc(c2))= âˆ…, suc(c2)âˆˆ _om)
  eleq2i(suc(c2), dom((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)), com)

  peano2b(c2)
  ex(Â¬ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ _om, ((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` suc(c2))= âˆ…)
  sylan9eqr(((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` suc(c2)), emptycls, ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4)`(c1 ` c2)), Â¬ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c2 âˆˆ _om)
  syl6eqr(((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` suc(c2)), ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4)`(c1 ` c2)), ((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4)`((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` c2)), c2 âˆˆ _om)
  frsuc(c2, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)
  fveq2i((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), (c1 ` c2), ((rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om)` c2))
  fveq1i(c1, c2, (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c3)|` _om))
  fvmptnf(s0, c0, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), (c1 ` c2), c4, universe)

blocks.name: frsucmpt2
blocks.content: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation (special case where the generation function is expressed in maps-to notation), using double-substitution instead of a bound variable condition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frsucmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, com), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csuc(c0)), c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5), com))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c6, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(c6, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  frsucmpt(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  nfcv(s1, c5)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  eqtr4i(c3, cres(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), c5), com), cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5), com))
  reseq1i(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), c5), com, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5))
  ax-mp(wceq(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), c5), crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5)), wceq(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), cmpt(s0, universe, c4)))
  cbvmptv(s1, s0, universe, c6, c4)
  rdgeq1(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frsucmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0 âˆˆ _om âˆ§ c1 âˆˆ c2)â†’(c3 ` suc(c0))= c1)
  âŠ£ c3 =(rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c5)|` _om)
  âŠ£ (s1 = s0 â†’ c6 = c4)
  âŠ£ (s1 =(c3 ` c0)â†’ c6 = c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c6)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c4)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  frsucmpt(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  nfcv(s1, c5)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  eqtr4i(c3, (rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c6), c5)|` _om), (rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c5)|` _om))
  reseq1i(rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c6), c5), com, rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c5))
  ax-mp(rec((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c6), c5)= rec((s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c5), (s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c6)=(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4))
  cbvmptv(s1, s0, universe, c6, c4)
  rdgeq1((s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c6), (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ c4), c5)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)

blocks.content: Index-aware recursive definitions over ` _om ` . A mashup of ~ df-rdg and ~ df-seq , this allows for recursive definitions that use an index in the recursion in cases where Infinity is not admitted. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-seqom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cseqom(c0, c1), cima(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), com))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-seqom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  âŠ¢ seqom(c0, c1)=(rec((s0 âˆˆ _om, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s0),(s0[c0]s1)>), < âˆ…,(= ` c1)>)" _om)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)
}

thm seqomlem0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))), diffsc(s3, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), crdg(cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))))))
  cbvmpt2v(s0, s1, s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))), cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))
  opeq12d(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  suceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))
  opeq2d(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cv(s3), cv(s2), c0)
  rdgeq1(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), cmpo(s2, s3, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))
  diff.csuc.s(s0, cv(s2))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.com.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cop.s(s1, csuc(cv(s2)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)))
  diff.csuc.s(s1, cv(s2))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.com.s(s2)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.csuc.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.com.s(s3)
  diff.universe.s(s3)
  diff.cop.s(s3, csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.csuc.s(s3, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s3, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
}

  a1ii(rec((s0 âˆˆ _om, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s0),(s0[c0]s1)>), < âˆ…,(= ` c1)>)= rec((s2 âˆˆ _om, s3 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s2),(s2[c0]s3)>), < âˆ…,(= ` c1)>), d(s3, c1))
  ax-mp(rec((s0 âˆˆ _om, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s0),(s0[c0]s1)>), < âˆ…,(= ` c1)>)= rec((s2 âˆˆ _om, s3 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s2),(s2[c0]s3)>), < âˆ…,(= ` c1)>), (s0 âˆˆ _om, s1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s0),(s0[c0]s1)>)=(s2 âˆˆ _om, s3 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ < suc(s2),(s2[c0]s3)>))
  cbvmpt2v(s0, s1, s2, s3, com, universe, < suc(s0),(s0[c0]s1)>, < suc(s2),(s2[c0]s3)>, < suc(s2),(s2[c0]s1)>)

blocks.name: seqomlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ` seqom ` . The underlying recursion generates a sequence of pairs with the expected first values. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2015.)

thm seqomlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cima(c0, com), emptycls), cfv(cid, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mpbir(wceq(cfv(cima(c0, com), emptycls), cfv(cid, c1)), wbr(emptycls, cima(c0, com), cfv(cid, c1)))
  mpbir(wbr(emptycls, cima(c0, com), cfv(cid, c1)), wcel(cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cima(c0, com)))
  eleqtrri(cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cima(c0, com), crn(cres(c0, com)))
  eqeltrri(cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), crn(cres(c0, com)), cfv(cres(c0, com), emptycls))
  3eqtri(cfv(cres(c0, com), emptycls), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cfv(c0, emptycls), cfv(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), emptycls))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(c0, com), emptycls), cfv(c0, emptycls)), wcel(emptycls, com))
  fvres(emptycls, com, c0)
  fveq1i(c0, emptycls, crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))))
  rdg0(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))
  opex(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cres(c0, com), emptycls), crn(cres(c0, com))), wfn(cres(c0, com), com), wcel(emptycls, com))
  mpbir(wfn(cres(c0, com), com), wfn(cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), com), com))
  frfnom(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))
  fneq1i(cres(c0, com), com, cres(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))), com))
  reseq1i(c0, com, crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, com, universe, cop(csuc(cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)))), cop(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))))
  fnfvelrn(cres(c0, com), com, emptycls)
  df-ima(c0, com)
  df-br(emptycls, cima(c0, com), cfv(cid, c1))
  mp2an(wb(wceq(cfv(cima(c0, com), emptycls), cfv(cid, c1)), wbr(emptycls, cima(c0, com), cfv(cid, c1))), wfn(cima(c0, com), com), wcel(emptycls, com))
  seqomlem2(s0, s1, c0, c2, c1)
  peano1()
  fnbrfvb(cima(c0, com), com, emptycls, cfv(cid, c1))
}
